scripts.mac: npm run build && env $(cat .env | xargs) SYNC_OS_KEYS=mac,mac_arm64 SA_SHOW_REPLAY=false node ./scripts/syncVersions.js
scripts.win: npm run build && env $(cat .env | xargs) SYNC_OS_KEYS=win32,win64 SA_SHOW_REPLAY=false node ./scripts/syncVersions.js
scripts.linux: npm run build && env $(cat .env | xargs) SYNC_OS_KEYS=linux SA_SHOW_REPLAY=false node ./scripts/syncVersions.js
